Sentencas: Two grades of chromium-free alloys were studied in order to apply them as interconnectors for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Formation of Conductive Oxide Scale on 33NK and 47ND Interconnector Alloys for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The surface modification methods were proposed for each alloy with the purpose of forming of oxide scales considering the required physicochemical properties.
Titulo: Formation of Conductive Oxide Scale on 33NK and 47ND Interconnector Alloys for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Investigations of the structure and properties of the obtained oxide scales were performed and the efficiency of the chosen surface modification methods was approved.
Titulo: Formation of Conductive Oxide Scale on 33NK and 47ND Interconnector Alloys for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The samples with the surface modification exhibited higher conductivity values in comparison with the nonmodified samples.
Titulo: Formation of Conductive Oxide Scale on 33NK and 47ND Interconnector Alloys for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A compatibility study of samples with surface modification and glass sealant of chosen composition was accomplished.
Titulo: Formation of Conductive Oxide Scale on 33NK and 47ND Interconnector Alloys for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The modified samples demonstrated good adhesion during testing and electrical resistance less than 40 mOhm/cm(2) at 850 degrees C in air, which allowed us to recommend these alloys with respective modified oxide scales as interconnectors for SOFC.
Titulo: Formation of Conductive Oxide Scale on 33NK and 47ND Interconnector Alloys for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
